basejump 0.6.4
  • Reference

EggNOG Annotations

Source: R/eggnog.R
eggnog.Rd

EggNOG is a hierarchical orthology framework with functional annotations for eukaryotic, prokaryotic, and viral genomes.

eggnog()

Value

list containing:

  1. "cogFunctionalCategories": Cluster of Orthologous Groups (COG) functional category information.

  2. "annotations": up-to-date functional descriptions and categories for Eukaryotes Non-supervised Orthologous Groups (euNOG) and Non-supervised Orthologous Groups (NOG) protein identifiers.

See also

EggNOG README

Other Annotation Functions: annotable, broadClass, convertGenesToSymbols, convertTranscriptsToGenes, convertUCSCBuildToEnsembl, detectOrganism, emptyRanges, geneSynonyms, hgnc2gene, makeGRangesFromEnsembl, makeGRangesFromGFF, makeGene2symbolFromEnsembl, makeGene2symbolFromGFF, makeTx2geneFromEnsembl, makeTx2geneFromGFF, mgi2gene, panther, stripTranscriptVersions

Examples

x <- eggnog()
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   taxonomicLevel = col_character(),
#>   groupName = col_character(),
#>   proteinCount = col_integer(),
#>   speciesCount = col_integer(),
#>   cogFunctionalCategory = col_character(),
#>   consensusFunctionalDescription = col_character()
#> )
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   taxonomicLevel = col_character(),
#>   groupName = col_character(),
#>   proteinCount = col_integer(),
#>   speciesCount = col_integer(),
#>   cogFunctionalCategory = col_character(),
#>   consensusFunctionalDescription = col_character()
#> )
glimpse(x)
#> List of 2
#>  $ cogFunctionalCategories:Classes 'tbl_df', 'tbl' and 'data.frame':	18 obs. of  2 variables:
#>   ..$ letter     : chr [1:18] "A" "B" "C" "E" ...
#>   ..$ description: chr [1:18] "RNA processing and modification" "Chromatin structure and dynamics" "Energy production and conversion" "Amino acid transport and metabolism" ...
#>  $ annotations            :Classes 'tbl_df', 'tbl' and 'data.frame':	286584 obs. of  3 variables:
#>   ..$ eggnogID                      : chr [1:286584] "COG0001" "COG0002" "COG0003" "COG0004" ...
#>   ..$ consensusFunctionalDescription: chr [1:286584] "Glutamate-1-semialdehyde aminotransferase" "N-acetylglutamate semialdehyde dehydrogenase" "ATPase required for the post-translational delivery of tail-anchored (TA) proteins to the endoplasmic reticulum"| __truncated__ "ammonium Transporter" ...
#>   ..$ cogFunctionalCategory         : chr [1:286584] "H" "E" "P" "P" ...
